website_summaries.verdict: A great pick for the woman who doesn't like heels. This style gives you height and a polished look without a wobbly heel stem.
pros: Wedge is more supportive than other styles

customer_reviews.title: This wedge is the perfect thing! I like to keep my heels low
customer_reviews.text: Going to a "barn" wedding and needed a dressy shoe that wouldn't sink into the grass. This wedge is the perfect thing! I like to keep my heels low ... this is a little higher than I usually wear, but the wedge seems to make all the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: a counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: this is a counterfeit product, it was torn down the first time my wife wore it
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautifully made and very comfortable. The only downsize, maybe not a downsize and only my fault, they scratch easily. I managed to scratch them the second day I wore them which was heartbreaking thinking how much I paid for them. Overall, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: dannysmommy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!! Will tear in two days
customer_reviews.text: This is my most horrible experience purchasing shoes online. This so-called Calvin Klein lady's shoe tore near the toe box in two days. I couldn't believe it and was most disappointed and dissatisfied. This could never be a genuine Calvin Klein product. Guess I got fooled. What is more disappointing is that I am unable to return the shoe as I live in the Caribbean. Returning an item from the Caribbean is not feasible economically so it's my loss! Sad!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Charles

customer_reviews.title: Not for bunions
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is attractive. It's not designed for someone with bunions as the edge of the shoe cuts into the bunion.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, look so nice - very feminine for a wedge heel. I felt like skipping. I just ordered in black patent because red were not available. I have had great luck with Calvin shoes- fit, wear and tear, etc. and highlight recommend, they are worth the money. I'm 56 & a plus size 18 woman.
customer_reviews.author: Eck

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Love the heel height, color and fit. They didn’t look very comfortable, but surprisingly they are. I just spent all day in them, but usually at the end of a day, I’m glad to get any shoe off....so, they worked for me
customer_reviews.author: Ann Privrasky

customer_reviews.title: Broken on the first week
customer_reviews.text: Guys the price is a joke. Shoes got broken in a first week?!! A $100 purchase ... I am speechless and disappointed. I saw someones comment with pictures of the same issue : ripped over front part after one use. Shame . Shopping for different product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I need them in every color
customer_reviews.text: The perfect shoe for the office, with the comfort of a flat but with a little height.
customer_reviews.author: dannysmommy

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this
customer_reviews.text: They’re comfortable and also same as it look in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Sonila

customer_reviews.title: WAY Too Small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful but we’re the most uncomfortable shoes I’ve ever worn. I read reviews and sized up half a size and I was still in so much pain after two days of wearing them. I have 4 huge blisters around my feet and my feet ache. I wear a 9 usually and a 9.5 isn’t even close to fitting. Sad because I have many Calvin Klein shoes and have had no issue before.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes for a wedding. And finding pretty navy blue ones are hard to find!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: i usually wear size 8 but oedered size 8.5 because my feet are wide.love the shoes got them in 2 colors
customer_reviews.author: nellie jatau

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful! They’re well made and comfortable right out of the box. I usually prefer heels but recently due to back issues, can’t wear them anymore, so I thought I’d try a wedge heel. These are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoes but they have come unglued after only two months of having them. They were only worn once a week during this time at the office. Unfortunately Amazon couldn't care less and has offered no help to remedy.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Shoes really cute! Should have bought 2 sizes bigger. For a medium it's really narrow. I gave my daughter instead.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Murray

customer_reviews.title: My perfect shoes! Its for petit ladies
customer_reviews.text: My perfect shoes! Its for petit ladies. I love it! Buy with confidence! I ususally wear sz 6. I ordered 5.5. Big. Returned. Ordered sz 5 no issues. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 loves online shopping!

customer_reviews.title: its run half size small
customer_reviews.text: its second time I purchase them i love the very comfortable run half size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Zisi H.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Exactly what I thought I was ordering and very comfortable, but dressy!
customer_reviews.author: D.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for all day wear!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes that can be worn all day. However, if you have a wide toe box you might want to size up.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Pusateri

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this low wedge style expecting style and comfort but the shoes are unbearable. The insoles are hard & don’t provide any arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Tooooooo small
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style but the shoe runs inconsistently small.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lafargue

customer_reviews.title: Size is off
customer_reviews.text: Pretty but the size it just off. I ordered a size 5 but size seemed like it’s a 6.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer U. Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: THE SHOES ARE PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THEM BECAUSE THEY ARE ELEGANT AND THEY ARE WHAT I EXPECT FROM A SHOES
customer_reviews.author: Veth

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of shoes, and prettier than the picture. Just-right heel height.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this pair of shoes , very comfortable, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey Pascall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes for everyday wear at the office.
customer_reviews.text: I think, it's true to size in general but for pointed toe shoes, I always half size up and it's good. The shoe in person is beautiful and seems well made. It also has arch support with right heel.
customer_reviews.author: Rita R.

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice , elegant and comfortable..but a little larger than usual for a fit CK size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe; love the color, love the style, the low but pretty heel. Unfortunately, you can feel the ground under the ball of your foot, and they squeak when you walk. I normally wear a 7.5 so I thought if I got an 8, I could put in an insert to help with comfort. It didn't work because then it was too big in the heel, and the shoes became unstable. I'll have to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: vivayoyis

customer_reviews.title: calvin klein germina pump
customer_reviews.text: These are very attractive shoes that--with their small wedge (1.75 inches) felt like flats. if you have wide feet like me, the back is going to feel a little narrow and press into the skin, which is why it's good to size up. The pointed toe style also feels a little narrow, but was less of an issue for me than the back. Either way, I sized up half a size so it didn't bother me as much since I had some extra room. In terms of quality, these shoes look pretty durable and well constructed. They also feel pretty light. Overall, these look good they would be good office shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alla S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable but I could use a tad larger toe box. I get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: crystal city girl

customer_reviews.title: Way too small, but beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: These were so small that I wonder if I even got the right size. I could not find a size written inside or in the bottom, but it feels at least a while size too small. Such a shame. I really love the color and style.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Expensive But Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and was happy with the look, fit, and comfort, but only wore them for one season and the patent leather started coming apart. I would expect to have these for a long time because they are around $100, but they didn't last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L Nygaard

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Women's Germina Pump
product_meta.description:
Pump

Calvin Klein is a premier American designer famous for the birth of designer jeans. Known as "the supreme master of minimalism," Calvin Klein is one of the world's leading lifestyle design companies known for minimalist and functional aesthetics. The brand is modern, uniquely sophisticated and offers timeless style. Calvin Klein handbags are designed with clean, classic, and trendy silhouettes. They provide accessible luxury for today's consumer and are the perfect blend of contemporary sophistication.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately not_applicable from arch
Leather lining and footbed. Wedge heel with signature logo
